Plot: A drug cartel boss who is arrested in a raid is coerced into betraying his former accomplices as part of an undercover operation.
Title: Drug War
Writer: Ka-Fai Wai (screenplay), Nai-Hoi Yau (screenplay), Ryker Chan (screenplay), Xi Yu (screenplay)
Actors: Honglei Sun, Louis Koo, Yi Huang, Yunxiang Gao
tomatoConsensus: A taut, solidly constructed action thriller with uncommon intelligence, Drug War delivers exhilarating set pieces without skimping on sophisticated filmmaking.
